comment.author: 61314110@N07
comment._content:
I will see what I can find. I think he might be a distant relation. My Great Grandfather Joseph 'Harry' Timberlake was killed in action in Nov 1917 at Cambrai... little is known about exactly how he died either.
Regards,
Howard Timberlake

comment.author: 69679868@N03
comment._content: S/14170 Private 'Harry' Timberlake.  Possibly born Aylesbury in 1893.  Possibly commemorated on the Lyons Memorial in Hammersmith, London W6.//

comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/howardtimberlake] Thanks, Howard. Hopefully something will turn up and you'll find a family connection.
